children.value: It's always a good habit to have the latest framework updated. This way, you have most recent bugs fixed and all the new features available. This can be done manually by changing files but if you have
installed can be done easily without having to download manually and to check for compatibility.
to update JQuery which will not only get the latest JQuery version of the main library but also will get the UI, Validation and other Javascript librairies that is close to JQuery.
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"How to easily update JQuery library with ASP.MVC project","date":"2012-02-27","categories":["asp-mvc"]}
